message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about cooking and the effects of heat. When milk is added to a hot pan, it quickly heats up. The heat causes the proteins in the milk to denature and form curds. These curds can be used to make cheese or other dairy products. Option (A) is incorrect because adding milk to a hot pan does not create rice. Option (B) is incorrect because adding milk to a hot pan does not create water, it may evaporate some of the water content in the milk but water is not created. Option (C) is not related to the effects of adding milk to a hot pan.

Option (C) is incorrect because fairies do not result from adding milk to a hot pan.
